long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: YMusic is a versatile browser extension designed to enhance your video and audio playback experience. It supports playing YouTube videos and direct video links effortlessly. Features include automatic replay, customizable playback controls, and seamless integration for a smoother browsing experience. Whether you're streaming your favorite music or watching educational videos, YMusic empowers you with flexible playback options directly within your browser.
